basics.name: Will Nixon
basics.label: Senior iOS Engineer
basics.summary: As a Senior iOS Engineer with extensive experience in building high-performance native applications using Swift, UIKit, and SwiftUI, I am passionate about crafting seamless user experiences and architecting scalable, maintainable mobile solutions. I have a proven track record of leading product initiatives, optimizing app efficiency, and enhancing user engagement. Notably, I spearheaded the development of features that boosted user retention by 25% and reduced app load times by 40%, directly improving performance and customer satisfaction.

work.summary: Fundrise is a real estate investment platform. I was quickly promoted to Senior iOS Engineer where I led project initiatives from scoping and grooming tickets through to QA and delivery.
work.name: Fundrise
highlights: Led the development of key features that boosted new-user investments by 25%, driving revenue growth.
Architected and implemented new iOS functionalities, ensuring seamless collaboration between product, design, and backend teams.
Optimized developer workflows, reducing build times by 40% and enhancing security through automation tools like Periphery.

work.summary: As iOS Engineer, I built features that focused on new users through their first 30 days on the platform. I implemented AB tests and new features that improved the Sign-Up experience for investors joining the platform.
work.name: Fundrise
highlights: Developed and optimized iOS onboarding flows, increasing user retention by 35% during the first 30 days.
Spearheaded the implementation of IRA account creation on iOS by adapting web functionalities, ensuring feature parity and user experience consistency.
Delivered high-quality features ahead of schedule, ensuring maintainable and scalable code.

work.summary: As iOS Engineer, I built features that focused on new users through their first 30 days on the platform. I implemented AB tests and new features that improved the Sign-Up experience for investors joining the platform.
work.name: Blue Raster
highlights: Developed and maintained full-stack applications using React, Redux, and Node.js, with a focus on performance optimization.
Built cloud-based applications and data-processing pipelines in Azure & AWS, enhancing system reliability.
Refactored legacy full-stack applications, improving code maintainability and performance using React and Next.js.

work.summary: As iOS Engineer, I built features that focused on new users through their first 30 days on the platform. I implemented AB tests and new features that improved the Sign-Up experience for investors joining the platform.
work.name: Blue Raster
highlights: Maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Apache Cordova, focusing on performance enhancements and bug fixes.
Led internal tech tutorials on Swift, Svelte, and Microsoft Azure, promoting continuous learning.

projects.name: ENdi
projects.description: An app offering personalized tracking and insights for managing female health conditions like endometriosis, PCOS, and more
highlights: Part of Microsoft for Startups Founder's Hub
200+ active subscribers from organic growth alone
Built with SwiftUI, HealthKit, Core Data, and CloudKit.

projects.name: Lemmi
projects.description: An iOS and Androit app enabling people with speech difficulties to communicate with ease and reconnect with others.
highlights: Built with UIKit, AVFoundation, Core Data, and CloudKit.
